title: Far-right opposes move to shield EU space companies from takeovers
summary_full: Representatives of MEPs from PfE and ECR groups spoke up against French S&D MEP François Kalfon's space security amendment, Euractiv has learned
summary_public: Representatives of MEPs from PfE and ECR groups spoke up against French S&D MEP François Kalfon's space security amendment, Euractiv has learned

FR.label: neutral
